Generation I.Red: A ferocious, prehistoric Pok é mon that goes for the enemy's throat with its serrated saw-like fangs.
Generation I.Green: (This entry was originally untranslated in English until it was reused in Pokémon FireRed .)
Generation I.Blue: A ferocious, prehistoric Pok é mon that goes for the enemy's throat with its serrated saw-like fangs.
Generation I.Yellow: A savage Pok é mon that died out in ancient times. It was resurrected using DNA taken from amber.
Generation I.Stadium: A Pokémon that was resurrected from the genes of an ancient dinosaur. With sharp fangs, it is very vicious.

Generation II.Gold: A vicious Pok é mon from the distant past, it appears to have flown by spreading its wings and gliding.
Generation II.Silver: This vicious Pok é mon is said to have flown in ancient skies while shrieking high-pitched cries.
Generation II.Crystal: In prehistoric times, this Pok é mon flew freely and fearlessly through the skies.
Generation II.Stadium 2: A vicious Pok é mon from the distant past, it appears to have flown by spreading its wings and gliding. (Pokémon Red, Silver, or Crystal inserted) This vicious Pok é mon is said to have flown in ancient skies while shrieking high-pitched cries. (Pokémon Blue, Gold, or Yellow inserted)

Generation III.Ruby: Aerodactyl is a Pok é mon from the age of dinosaurs. It was regenerated from genetic material extracted from amber. It is imagined to have been the king of the skies in ancient times.
Generation III.Sapphire: Aerodactyl is a Pok é mon from the age of dinosaurs. It was regenerated from genetic material extracted from amber. It is imagined to have been the king of the skies in ancient times.
Generation III.Emerald: Aerodactyl is a Pok é mon from the age of dinosaurs. It was regenerated from DNA extracted from amber. It is imagined to have been the king of the skies.
Generation III.FireRed: It was regenerated from a dinosaur's genetic matter that was found in amber. It flies with high-pitched cries.
Generation III.LeafGreen: A ferocious, prehistoric Pok é mon that goes for the enemy's throat with its serrated, sawlike fangs.

Generation IV.Diamond: A Pokémon that roamed the skies in the dinosaur era. Its teeth are like saw blades.
Generation IV.Pearl: A Pokémon that roamed the skies in the dinosaur era. Its teeth are like saw blades.
Generation IV.Platinum: A Pokémon that roamed the skies in the dinosaur era. Its teeth are like saw blades.
Generation IV.HeartGold: A vicious Pokémon from the distant past, it appears to have flown by spreading its wings and gliding.
Generation IV.SoulSilver: This vicious Pokémon is said to have flown in ancient skies while shrieking high-pitched cries.

Generation V.Black: A Pokémon that roamed the skies in the dinosaur era. Its teeth are like saw blades.
Generation V.White: A Pokémon that roamed the skies in the dinosaur era. Its teeth are like saw blades.
Generation V.Black 2: A Pokémon that roamed the skies in the dinosaur era. Its teeth are like saw blades.
Generation V.White 2: A Pokémon that roamed the skies in the dinosaur era. Its teeth are like saw blades.

Generation VI.X: It was regenerated from a dinosaur's genetic matter that was found in amber. It flies with high-pitched cries.
Generation VI.Y: This vicious Pokémon is said to have flown in ancient skies while shrieking high-pitched cries.
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: Aerodactyl is a Pokémon from the age of dinosaurs. It was regenerated from genetic material extracted from amber. It is imagined to have been the king of the skies in ancient times.
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: Aerodactyl is a Pokémon from the age of dinosaurs. It was regenerated from genetic material extracted from amber. It is imagined to have been the king of the skies in ancient times.

Generation VII.Sun: Part of its body has become stone. Some scholars claim that this is Aerodactyl's true appearance.
Generation VII.Moon: When it Mega Evolves, it becomes more vicious than ever before. Some say that's because its excess of power is causing it pain.
Generation VII.Ultra Sun: It will attack anything that moves. Mega Evolution is a burden on its body, so it's incredibly irritated.
Generation VII.Ultra Moon: Mega Evolution awakened some dormant genes, bringing back the sharp rocks that once covered Aerodactyl's entire body.
Generation VII.Let's Go Pikachu: The power of Mega Evolution has completely restored its genes. The rocks on its body are harder than diamond.
Generation VII.Let's Go Eevee: The power of Mega Evolution has completely restored its genes. The rocks on its body are harder than diamond.

Generation VIII.Sword: This is a ferocious Pokémon from ancient times. Apparently even modern technology is incapable of producing a perfectly restored specimen.
Generation VIII.Shield: Aerodactyl's sawlike fangs can shred skin to tatters—even the skin of Steel-type Pokémon.
Generation VIII.Brilliant Diamond: It's a Pokémon that roamed the skies in the dinosaur era. Its teeth are like saw blades.
Generation VIII.Shining Pearl: It's a Pokémon that roamed the skies in the dinosaur era. Its teeth are like saw blades.
